definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: Why? Because people don't want another Thresher.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼？由於人們不想要另一臺脫粒機。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the manufacture of a new type of corn thresher.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種新型甜玉米脫粒機的研製。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a multifunctional thresher which belongs to an implement working on fields in agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 多功能脫粒機屬於農業機械中的場上作業機具。
因此你能買到玉米脫粒機。
於是穆那查到了脫粒機那裏。

sentences.english: How design that height mass maize sheller is the priority designing that out.
sentences.chinese: 如何設計出高質量的玉米脫粒機是設計的重點。

sentences.english: Now, volunteers are designing a pedal-powered grain crusher.
sentences.chinese: 現在，志願者們在設計腳踏裝置的稻穀脫粒機。

sentences.english: Before thrashing machines farmers thrashed their wheat by hand.
sentences.chinese: 在有脫粒機之前，農民用手打麥脫粒。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a holding-type rice thresher which belongs to a working implement on fields in agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 夾持式水稻脫粒機屬於農業機械中的場上作業機具。

sentences.english: The thresher has the advantages of higher percentage of threshing and no damage of the corn cobs.
sentences.chinese: 本脫粒機不但脫粒率較高，而且玉米芯又不會破損。
